description: The upload destination contains information necessary to start an upload to an S3 bucket not managed by Synapse. This destination is mapped from an ExternalObjectStorageLocationSetting.

endpointUrl.description: endpoint URL of the S3 service (for example: 'https://s3.amazonaws.com')

keyPrefixUUID.description: A UUID prefix used to identify the file to be uploaded. This field will have a new, unique value every time a new UploadDestination is retrieved.
